text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to draw a foal?
text.Response A:
Personalize your computer.
Organize your computer.
Learn to Program your Computer.
Clean your computer.
Use paint or another photo editing program.
Listen to music.
Watch videos.
Write a story.
Get familiarized with your computer programs.
Make a virtual diary.
Become a computer geek.
Play Minesweeper or Solitaire.
text.Response B:
Add two ovals.

Draw a small oval at the right of the image.

Add two more legs.

Add the final leg by drawing three rectangles.

49.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to draw a foal?

Response A

Personalize your computer.
Organize your computer.
Learn to Program your Computer.
Clean your computer.
Use paint or another photo editing program.
Listen to music.
Watch videos.
Write a story.
Get familiarized with your computer programs.
Make a virtual diary.
Become a computer geek.
Play Minesweeper or Solitaire.

Response B

Add two ovals.

Draw a small oval at the right of the image.

Add two more legs.

Add the final leg by drawing three rectangles.
